shows.title: A Beginners Guide To Changing The World
shows.desc:
Is there something you would like to change about the world? Have you got an idea for a campaign but don’t know how to make it a reality? Whether you are an experienced activist or a total beginner, Ellen will give you ideas and skills to make your campaigning more creative and effective.

Ellen is an award-winning campaigner, writer and digital content creator whose work focuses on LGBTQ+ and disability rights, mental health rights, and feminist issues.
